rukus.text: wa-alladhina kadhabu biayatina sanastadrijuhum min haythu la yaʿlamuna
awalam yatafakkaru ma bisahibihim min jinnatin in huwa illa nadhirun mubinun
awalam yanzuru fi malakuti l-samawati wal-ardi wama khalaqa l-lahu min shayin wa-an ʿasa an yakuna qadi iq'taraba ajaluhum fabi-ayyi hadithin baʿdahu yu'minuna
man yud'lili l-lahu fala hadiya lahu wayadharuhum fi tugh'yanihim yaʿmahuna

yasalunaka ʿani l-saʿati ayyana mur'saha qul innama ʿil'muha ʿinda rabbi la yujalliha liwaqtiha illa huwa thaqulat fi l-samawati wal-ardi la tatikum illa baghtatan yasalunaka ka-annaka hafiyyun ʿanha qul innama ʿil'muha ʿinda l-lahi walakinna akthara l-nasi la yaʿlamuna
qul la amliku linafsi nafʿan wala darran illa ma shaa l-lahu walaw kuntu aʿlamu l-ghayba la-is'takthartu mina l-khayri wama massaniya l-suu in ana illa nadhirun wabashirun liqawmin yu'minuna
